description: One of the Specters presented by Kurumada in his original manga, Earthly Dark Star, Deep Niobe followed Griffon Minos in his invasion of the Sanctuary (he was part of Rhadamanthys` legions). Confident of his immunity to poisons, he challenges Pisces Albafica and used the Deep Fragrance a perfumed poisonous pheromone upon which contact organic matter rots, but Albafica easily survives it and kills him by using his venomous blood.
name: Chiansei Deep no Niobe
